description: This file defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) named ProductRequest used for creating or updating product information, including fields for name, price, and quantity, with validation annotations and documentation annotations.

classes.name: ProductRequest
classes.description: A DTO class representing the payload for creating or updating a product, including name, price, and quantity fields with validation and schema annotations.
